elements.name: Area
elements.label: Area
elements.visible: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: Building
elements.label: Building
elements.visible: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: Room
elements.label: Room
elements.visible: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: Request Details Section 2
elements.visible: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: Is there a potential to disturb ACM or PACM
elements.label: Is there a potential to disturb Asbestos Containing Material (ACM) / Presumed Asbestos Containing Material (PACM)?
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: ACM Work Control Package Number
elements.label: If yes, list the applicable Work Control Package Number:
elements.visible: values('Is there a potential to disturb ACM or PACM')==="Yes"

elements.name: Is there potential to disturb lead based paint
elements.label: Is there potential to disturb lead based paint?
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: Lead Paint Work Control Package Number
elements.label: If yes, list the applicable Work Control Package Number:
elements.visible: values('Is there potential to disturb lead based paint')==="Yes"

elements.name: Note
elements.text: Note: If you are unable to answer the above questions, contact your Project Health and Safety professional.

elements.name: Beryllium
elements.label: For the requested service, has a beryllium assessment for the applicable facility, structure and/or Conex box been performed by a qualified Industrial Hygienist?
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: Note 2
elements.text: If the work location is BCA or BRA status, a Work Control Package with a Beryllium Work Permit and Beryllium Hazard Analysis is required.
elements.visible: values('Beryllium Status')=="BCA - Beryllium Controlled Area" ||  values('Beryllium Status') ==  "BRA - Beryllium Regulated Area"

elements.name: Beryllium Work Control Package Number
elements.label: List the applicable Work Control Package Number:
elements.visible: values('Beryllium Status')=="BCA - Beryllium Controlled Area" ||  values('Beryllium Status') ==  "BRA - Beryllium Regulated Area"

elements.name: NEPA
elements.label: Is a National Environmental Policy Act (NEPA) review required?
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: NEPA Documentation Exists
elements.label: Does NEPA documentation exist for the service requested?

elements.name: NEPA Note
elements.text:
Please contact your Environmental Compliance Officer, NEPA subject matter expert, or other NEPA trained individuals for guidance.

The requester may use Site Form A-6006-139 to support the portion of the integral elements that address the need for Cultural and Ecologic reviews and clearance to ensure there is no adverse affects to environmentally sensitive resources.

elements.name: NEPA Documentation Note
elements.text:
*In listing a CX, the service requester has determined that the work is categorically excludable in accordance with 10 CFR 1021, subpart D, paragraph 1021.410; including satisfaction of conditions that are "integral elements" of the classes of action in 10 CFR 1021, subpart D, appendix B.

The requester may use Site Form A-6006-139 to support the portion of the integral elements that address the need for Cultural and Ecological reviews and clearance to ensure there is no adverse affects to environmentally sensitive resources.

elements.name: Tank Farm Adjacent
elements.label: Is this work to be performed adjacent to a Tank Farm or Tank Farm fence?
elements.visible: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: Work Control Packages
elements.label: Does this Service Request require a Work Control Package other than Asbestos / Lead Based Paint?
elements.visible: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"
elements.required: values('Service Requested') == "Locks" || values('Service Requested') == "Keying/Rekeying" || values('Service Requested') == "Miscellaneous Interior/Exterior Work"

elements.name: Other Work Control Packages
elements.label: List the applicable Work Control Package Number:
Submit
elements.name: Submit Button
elements.visible: values('NEPA Documentation Exists')=="Yes" || values('NEPA Documentation Exists') !="No"

elements.name: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete
elements.title: Hidden System Questions Do Not Delete
